knowledge.content: Product-market fit (PMF) is the degree to which a product satisfies market demand. Achieving PMF is crucial for startup success. Key indicators include high customer satisfaction, low churn rate, and strong organic growth. Strategies for achieving PMF include identifying your target market, understanding their needs, and iterating on your product based on their feedback.

Scaling a startup requires building a scalable infrastructure, optimizing your operations, and hiring the right people. Key strategies include automating repetitive tasks, implementing data-driven decision-making, and building a strong company culture. It's essential to maintain your product quality and customer satisfaction while scaling your business.
